[{'url': 'https://investor.com/rias/stonebridge-capital-advisors-111447', 'content': 'In the past ten years, firm or an advisory affiliate has been convicted of or pled guilty or nolo contendere ("no contest") in a domestic, foreign, or military court to a misdemeanor involving: investments or an investment-related business, or any fraud, false statements, or omissions, wrongful taking of property, bribery, perjury, forgery, counterfeiting, extortion, or a conspiracy to commit any of these offenses.
 Why does your firm believe in offering commission-based services to clients?
SEC ADV Part 1 | Item 7.A.12
What does this mean and why is it important?
Firm is affiliated with an insurance company or agent who may be motivated to insure clients with products that generate high sales commissions when lower cost alternatives may exist. The best way to know if a financial advisor is a fiduciary all of the time is to ask: "Are you a fiduciary in all of your dealings with me?" Also be sure to review the conflicts of interest and disciplinary actions sections above to see what, if any, conflicts of interest and/or disciplinary actions this firm might have.
 What does this mean and why is it important?
Firm or a related person recommends the purchase of securities where the firm or a related person serves as an underwriter or general or managing partner.
 A federal regulatory agency, a state regulatory agency, or a foreign financial regulatory authority other than the SEC or CFTC has found firm or an advisory affiliate to have been involved in a violation of investment-related statutes or regulations.

Registered Investment Advisor | Stonebridge Capital Management  (310) 277-1450 Hours of Operation: Mon - Fri 8:00am - 8:00pm Home Team Philosophy Process More Less Contact Button STONEBRIDGE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT, INC. Stonebridge is a registered investment adviser founded in 1946 by Julian Weiss. Since it's conception, the firm has specialized in serving the unique needs of high net worth individuals and families. The investment experience of our portfolio management team spans over 40 years. Our wealth and retirement planning experience allows us to understand each client's unique set of objectives. The firm is 100% owned by its management and is neither affiliated with nor a division of any other entity. Our philosophy is about understanding at a foundational level what is important to you and your values, and creating an investment strategy that will help you realize your goals.
